name: CUBSICAL
description:
Have you ever wanted to immerse yourself in musical history AND dodge blocks at the same time? Well then, highly specific individual, you're in luck! With CUBSICAL, you can! The first game created by Kirstine "Kissi" Nordtorp-Nielsen, this is a simple, but fun little number that leave you with a smile on your face and some new facts in your noggin. So, go ahead; pick up your instruments, straighten your sheet music, and give the CUBSICAL a whirl!

For more information on the making of CUBSICAL and other future pieces, please visit artbykirstine.weebly.com
